title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other models locally with one command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, generate completions, pull/manage models programmatically.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same capabilities as Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models for chat, tools, embeddings, and structured output.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, RAG, multi-user); renamed to ‘Open WebUI’.

title: ollama4j – Java Ollama Client
summary: Unofficial Java/Kotlin client with fluent API, streaming, and model management helpers.

title: ollama-rb – Ruby gem
summary: Official Ruby client wrapping Ollama’s REST API; chat, generate, embed, pull/list models.

title: ollama-cli – Rust TUI
summary: Rust terminal UI for interactive chat with Ollama models, history, syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot – VS Code extension
summary: Bring local Ollama models into VS Code inline suggestions and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and PVC support.

title: ollama-gui – Flutter desktop app
summary: Cross-platform Flutter GUI to chat with Ollama models; Windows, macOS, Linux builds.

title: ollama-csharp – .NET client
summary: Unofficial C# client for Ollama with async streaming, dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-dagger – Dagger module
summary: Dagger CI module to pull and run Ollama models inside pipelines for testing or generation tasks.

title: ollama-telegram – Telegram bot
summary: Self-hostable Telegram bot that proxies chats to your local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-nim – Nimble client
summary: Nim language wrapper for Ollama REST API; small static binaries.

title: ollama-rag – Minimal RAG example
summary: Python notebook showing how to build a RAG pipeline with Ollama embeddings and LangChain.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-discord – Discord bot
summary: Discord.py bot that chats with local Ollama models, supports slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-macos-menu – Swift menu-bar
summary: Native macOS menu-bar app to start/stop Ollama server and switch models from the tray.

title: ollama-obsidian – Obsidian plugin
summary: Obsidian.md plugin to run local LLM prompts inside notes and get inline completions.
